DOC.brief_summary: To compare effect subcutenous sterile water injection technique subcutaneous saline injection technique degree duration low back pain-relieving childbirth
DOC.brief_title: Subcutaneous Sterile Water Injection Relief Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Study sample : The convenience sample recruit randomly basic odd number saline injection even number give placebo ( Sterile water injection ) Setting : Labor ward Women 's health center Assiut university hospital Study design : Experimental Randomized control study Sample size : The sample size calculate use formula N= ( Zα+Zβ ) 2 x 2p ( 1-p ) ÷d2 , take level significance 5 % , Zα=1.96 power test 80 % , Zβ=0.84 . p=0.113 . A sample size 165 group calculate . Total 330 woman study ( 165 arm ) Inclusion criterion - In labour ( spontaneous induce - During first stageof labour - Primary multiparous woman - A term singleton pregnancy ( 37 + 0 41 week ) - Have fetus cephalic presentation - Experience back pain assess visual analogue scale VAS Face pain analogue ( Warden V , Hurley AC , Volicer L.2003 ) - Provide informed consent . Exclusion criterion - Multiple pregnancy - Malpresentation ( breech , transverse , shoulder ) - Previous CS - Infection inflammation injection site complication could cause bleed injection site eg . Thrombocytopenia . Study Tools : 1 . Personal data questionnaire 2 . Visual Analogue Scale Face analogue scale 3 . Satisfaction scale
DOC.criteria: In labour ( spontaneous induce record During first stage labour Primary multiparous woman A term singleton pregnancy ( 37 + 0 41 week ) Have fetus cephalic presentation Experience back pain assess visual analogue scale VAS Face pain analogue Provide inform consent . Women chronic disease Medical condition associate pregnancy ( Preeclampsia Eclampsia Diabetic pregnancy ... . etc ) Complicated labor process ( obstruct , preterm labor , twin )
